content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 22}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft brown_stained_glass_pane, I need to craft brown_dye first. Brown_dye requires placing 1 cocoa_beans in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the cocoa_beans from slot 15 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 22}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I can now craft the brown_dye by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Ok
